pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with the Prime Minister of Thailand, Prayut Chan-o-cha | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Last night, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke with the Prime Minister of Thailand, Prayut Chan-o-cha. The two leaders looked forward to working together, following recent elections in Canada and Thailand.

Prime Minister Trudeau expressed his disappointment that he is unable to attend this weekend’s ASEAN Leaders’ Summit in Bangkok as a guest of Prime Minister Prayut.

The Prime Minister reiterated Canada’s commitment to deeper engagement with ASEAN on a wide range of regional economic, political, and security issues. The two leaders exchanged views on how to expand bilateral trade and investment cooperation.

Prime Minister Trudeau and Prime Minister Prayut reaffirmed their commitment to the continued collaboration between Canada and Thailand on shared priorities.
